= RetroWeb Vintage Computer Museum =

Welcome to the <cite>RetroWeb Vintage Computer Museum</cite>, a web exhibit where you get to interact with and learn about personal computers and software from the early to late-eighties.

{ "icons" :
	[
		["Get Started!",           "folder-dot",     "/articles/Exhibits"]
	],
	"class" : "float-right"
}

This website makes use of emulators. An emulator allows your computer to simulate the operation of computers that are now obsolete, all inside your web browser!

Click the &ldquo;Get Started!&rdquo; icon to begin, read [[technical information|/docs/more]] or look through the site [[credits|/docs/credits]].
